question:
Question: Navigation Instruction given at initial position: [go straight and move to the top of the view. take slowly left and turn around the top of the building. near by the building and in front of advertisements on the board. go straight and move to the bridge and turn right into the building. more than the advertisements in the building. go straight and move to cross the lake and nearby the building blocks. turn around the building and turn right to the top of the view. move upwards and turn around the building.]. At the initial position, you are asked to move according to a series of movement instructions. When you reach the current location, what is your landmark position relative to the bridge?  
choose:  
A. I am on the left side of the bridge.  
B. I am far away from the bridge.  
C. I am located above the bridge.  
D. I am located on the right side of the bridge.  
E. I am under the bridge.

textgrad_result.init_answer: Option: C; Reason: The navigation instructions mention moving to the top of the view and crossing the lake, which suggests an elevated position. The current frames show a high vantage point overlooking the cityscape, indicating that the agent is above the bridge.
textgrad_result.evaluation:
Location: [(02:19, 02:37)]
Option: []
Reason: From 02:19 to 02:37, the video shows the bridge in the distance. The camera is on top of a building, looking out towards the bridge. Therefore, the agent is located above the bridge.
Location: [(02:19, 02:37)]
Option: [C]
Reason: From 02:19 to 02:37, the video shows the bridge in the distance. The camera is on top of a building, looking out towards the bridge. Therefore, the agent is located above the bridge.
